data.title: Pigeon Favourite IC 1800 W Induction Cooktop  (Black, Push Button)
data.description: The user-friendly Pigeon Favourite induction cooktop features an LED display and a crystal body which makes it easy to use and durable. Easily portable, this induction cooktop comes with 7 preset menus. For a high heating efficiency, this Pigeon induction uses a bigger heating element.

data.title: Prestige PKOSS Electric Kettle
data.description: It comes with automatic shut-off with Boil Dry Protection feature that makes it safe for homes with kids. Also, it ensures the temperature control is more accurate, along with making it more durable.

data.title: Mi LED Smart TV 4A 80 cm (32)
data.description: Explore every detail in brilliant clarity, along with vibrant life-like colors and enhanced brightness. Thanks to the upgraded graphics engine, there is reduced noise and improved contrast and brightness.

data.title: Samsung 6.2 kg Fully Automatic Top Load Washing Machine Grey
data.description: A stainless steel pulsator ensures a powerful washing performance and helps to keep the inside hygienically clean. Its 6 blades create a wide and intense shower of water that removes dirt effectively and rinses thoroughly. And itâ€™s very scratch resistant, which inhibits the growth of bacteria.

data.title: Samsung 192 L Direct Cool Single Door 5 Star Refrigerator
data.description: This technology makes precise cooling adjustments, keeping your food fresh for a long duration. It also senses the changes in temperature and accordingly adjusts the compressor speed, ensuring energy-efficient and noise-free performance.
